metadata.synopsis: The players have just touched the base of the brain stem in the entrance of High Hall, resulting in some brain quakes and a AD from the Netherbrain. This PAD reinforces that the party will have to traverse higher in order to climb up the brain.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load END_Maingoto 350; 15; 75Click on the brain stem

0.speaker: Player
0.text: I suppose we'll need to find somewhere higher up.
